## A Multiple Regression on MPG

This is a test to write an .Rmd file. 

Our message is: First we regress all other variales on mpg.

```{r cars}
input<-mtcars
input$am <- as.factor(input$am)
levels(input$am) <-c('AT', 'MT')

fit <- fit_all<-lm(mpg~.,data=input)
summary(fit)
```
